english: I have my phone switched off.
I have a very kind neighbor.
I am sleepy.

spanish: Tengo curiosidad por aprender más español.
english: I am curious to learn more Spanish.
I am thirsty.
I am hungry.
I am cold.
I am hot.
I am in a hurry.
I am right.
I feel like traveling.
I have to study.
I have a question.
I have a red car.
I have a very affectionate dog.
I have two brothers.
I have many friends in Spain.
I have an appointment tomorrow.
I have a new job.

spanish: Tengo una casa en el campo.
english: I have a house in the countryside.
I have a great idea.

spanish: Tengo una reunión a las tres.
english: I have a meeting at three.
I have a fever.
I have a cough.
I am allergic to pollen.

spanish: Tengo una gata blanca y naranja.
english: I have a white and orange cat.
I have a blue bicycle.
I have an exam on Monday.
I have free time this afternoon.
I have to go to the supermarket.

spanish: Tengo que llamar a mi madre.
english: I have to call my mother.
I have to clean the house.

spanish: Tengo un amigo que vive en México.
english: I have a friend who lives in Mexico.

spanish: Tengo ganas de comer algo dulce.
english: I feel like eating something sweet.
I have a very interesting book.
I have a surprise for you.

spanish: Tengo una lista de tareas pendientes.
english: I have a to-do list.

spanish: Tengo una maleta lista para viajar.
english: I have a suitcase ready to travel.

spanish: Tengo un billete de avión para Madrid.
english: I have a plane ticket to Madrid.
I have to wake up early tomorrow.

spanish: Tengo un proyecto importante en el trabajo.
english: I have an important project at work.

spanish: Tengo que comprar pan y leche.
english: I have to buy bread and milk.

spanish: Tengo una nueva afición: la fotografía.
english: I have a new hobby: photography.

spanish: Tengo un buen recuerdo de aquel viaje.
english: I have a good memory of that trip.
I am afraid of heights.

spanish: Tengo curiosidad por aprender más español.
english: I am curious to learn more Spanish.

spanish: Tengo que hacer ejercicio más a menudo.
english: I have to exercise more often.

spanish: Tengo que devolver este libro a la biblioteca.
english: I have to return this book to the library.

spanish: Tengo que cocinar la cena esta noche.
english: I have to cook dinner tonight.

spanish: Tengo que escribir un mail importante.
english: I have to write an important email.
